DOC.brief_summary: Pelvic organ prolapse problem experienced woman bulge come vagina , may even drop outside vagina . The bulge vagina cause organ move normal position pelvis push vagina . This common problem many woman give birth mild bulge cause symptom . Women however experience variety pelvic , bladder , bowel sexual symptom impact daily life . No research study properly examine whether exercise prevent prolapse . This study aim explore whether exercise taught physiotherapist prevent woman develop prolapse require treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effects Physiotherapy Prevent Pelvic Organ Prolapse
DOC.criteria: Women involve ProLong study : evidence vaginal laxity compartment ( POPQ stage I , II III ) previous treatment prolapse ( surgery , pessary , PFMT ) Women must willing participate Trial comply group allocation . Women : stage 0 IV prolapse previous incontinence surgery ( except midurethral sling operation ) previous formal instruction PFMT diagnosis precede five year pregnant , deliver baby within last six month unable comply PFMT treatment unable give inform consent
